With query:
SELECT table_P.key AS key, table_P.val AS val_P, table_R.val AS val_R, table_S.val AS val_S, table_T.val AS val_T FROM table_P, table_R, table_S, table_T WHERE table_P.key=table_R.key AND table_R.key=table_S.key AND table_S.key=table_T.key
